Detailed Description

ZoomFXOrientation is used to set all ZoomFX orientation properties.

ZoomFXOrientation is derived from the ZoomFX structure ZOOMFX_ORIENTATION. The structure is made slightly more user friendly by providing a Clear() function which resets all ZoomFX buffer properties to their default values. The Clear() function is also automatically called when the structure is created. Because it is derived from ZOOMFX_ORIENTATION, it can be used interchangeably with this structure since it is binary compatible.
